title: Early crypto traders had speedy profit on Trump coin as others suffered losses
summary: Early $TRUMP cryptocurrency insiders made millions of dollars, and Trump and his family pocketed nearly $100 million in fees, while over 800,000 investors lost a combined $2 billion
